plot: Daniel is a performance artist. Everything is going great with his new girlfriend Maggie, until his best friend convinces him to use her as the subject of their latest art piece.
title: Be Good Daniel
plot_es: Daniel is a performance artist. Everything is going great with his new girlfriend Maggie, until his best friend convinces him to use her as the subject of their latest art piece.
plot_en: Daniel is a performance artist. Everything is going great with his new girlfriend Maggie, until his best friend convinces him to use her as the subject of their latest art piece.

produce.name: North Carolina School of the Arts

cast.role: Guy Holding Sign and Cheering at City Fountain
cast.name: Jeff M. Giordano
